title: Vendor AI Request
desc: Marketing wants to use a free AI tool to generate ad copy. It is not SOC 2 compliant.

left.msg: Marketing hates you, but the data is safe.

right.msg: Ad campaign launched early. Data privacy is... questionable.

title: Ransomware Detected
desc: An endpoint in Finance is encrypted. The attacker demands $50k.

left.msg: You paid. Finance is back online, but you funded crime.

right.msg: It took the team all weekend, but we didn't negotiate with terrorists.

title: CFO Cuts Budget
desc: The CFO wants to cut your 'Penetration Testing' budget to save Q4 numbers.

left.msg: CFO is happy. You are flying blind on vulnerabilities.

right.msg: You kept the money, but the CFO is ignoring your emails now.

title: Zero-Day: Log4j
desc: Critical vulnerability found in your Java stack. Patching requires downtime.

left.msg: Production went down for 2 hours. Customers are angry, but safe.

right.msg: You rolled the dice. Let's hope no one scans us before Saturday.
